channel.title: Added Custom, but I disappear
channel.description:
I need a little help. I have created my own custom, added it to my client, set the ints, visible icon. But, there is a few issues.
One: when I wear certain armor and put on my custom sword, I go invisible. Two: I can drop the item and it appears, but I have to right-click and click take. The first selection when I right-click is just "...".
I am willing to give anyone some rep if they help me out.

item.title: Added Custom, but I disappear
item.dc:creator: @AlexDGr8r AlexDGr8r
item.description:
@AlexDGr8r wrote:

I mean to drop items. In client.java search- 
public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot)

Replace below it with

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true;

That is exactly what I have.

:P is the face count over 2k?

No, I don’t believe it is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 08:55:34 pm[/size][hr]Actually, I must correct myself. I do have over 2k faces. :o Any idea on what I should do?

Read full topic
